channel.title: User Access Node (UAN)
channel.description: Recent content on User Access Node (UAN)

item.description: toc_title=test plan for uais on uans (k3s verification); given_title=test plan for uais on uans (k3s verification); menuTitle: “Test Plan for UAIs on UANs (K3s Verification)” date: Sun Mar 26 02:00:59 UTC 2023 draft: false weight: 82 Test Plan for UAIs on UANs (K3s Verification) Overview Perform this procedure to verify that K3s on UANs can launch the services necessary to replicate UAIs as Podman containers. The steps in this guide are biased towards simplicity and light on explanation.

toc_title=test plan for user access node (uan) and repurposed compute node as uan; given_title=test plan for user access node (uan) and repurposed compute node as uan; menuTitle: “Test Plan for User Access Node (UAN) and Repurposed Compute Node as UAN” date: Sun Mar 26 02:00:59 UTC 2023 draft: false weight: 81 Test Plan for User Access Node (UAN) and Repurposed Compute Node as UAN The following is the test plan for the User Access Node (UAN) or a Compute Node that has been repurposed to function as a UAN.
